49.name: Sculptor
49.body: Prepare one room (any color) at no cost; must be in the bottom two floors.
49.details: If the bottom two floors are already full of rooms, you get nothing.

50.name: Musician
50.body: Draw 1 staff card. Additionally, prepare one room (any color) at normal cost.

53.name: Flamenco Dancer
53.body: Get 1 coffee and advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track.

54.name: Portrait Painter
54.body: Get 1 dish or drink of your choice and 2 krones.

56.name: Vocalist
56.body: Get 1 cake. Additionally, play a staff card from hand, paying up to 3 krones less.

57.name: Architect
57.body: Prepare up to two rooms (any color), paying 1 krone less each.

58.name: Actress
58.body: Occupy one additional room (any color) by turning it to the occupied side.

59.name: Poet
59.body: Get 1 cake. Additionally, play a staff card from hand, paying up to 2 krones less.

61.name: Painter
61.body: Prepare up to two rooms: pay 1 krone less for one; if you prepare a second, pay normal cost.

62.name: Opera Singer
62.body: Take a guest from the queue at no cost. Additionally, advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track.

63.name: Dame
63.body: Take a guest from the queue at no cost.

64.name: Duchess
64.body: Play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less.

66.name: Landgrave
66.body: Play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less. Additionally, prepare one room (any color) at normal cost.

67.name: Sovereign
67.body: Draw 2 staff cards. Additionally, advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track.

68.name: Princess
68.body: Advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track.

70.name: Elector
70.body: Play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less. Additionally, advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track.

71.name: Baron
71.body: Prepare one room (any color) at no cost.

72.name: Prince
72.body: Occupy one additional room (any color) by turning it to the occupied side.

73.name: Count
73.body: Play up to two staff cards from hand, paying 1 krone less each.

75.name: Baroness
75.body: Draw 3 staff cards and immediately play one, paying up to 3 krones less. Return the other two to the bottom of the deck.
75.details: If you cannot afford or don't want to play any, return all three.

76.name: Duke
76.body: Draw 3 staff cards and immediately play one at no cost. Return the other two to the bottom of the deck.

78.name: Post Councillor
78.body: Take a guest from the queue at no cost.

79.name: Privy Councillor
79.body: Get 1 krone and advance 1 space on the Emperor track.

80.name: Professor Emeritus
80.body: Take a guest from the queue at no cost.

82.name: Senior Councillor
82.body: Occupy one additional room (any color) by turning it to the occupied side.

84.name: Court Councillor
84.body: Get 3 krones. Additionally, take a guest from the queue at no cost.

86.name: Veterinary Councillor
86.body: Play a staff card from hand, paying up to 3 krones less.

87.name: Medicinal Councillor
87.body: Get 3 krones. Additionally, take up to two guests from the queue at no cost (replenish the queue before taking the second).

88.name: Procurator
88.body: Prepare up to two rooms (any color), both at no cost.

93.name: Mr. Horsa
93.body: Advance 1 space on the Emperor track.

94.name: M. Ingalls
94.body: Play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less.

95.name: Mr. Boydell
95.body: Advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track.

96.name: Mr. Oundo
96.body: Play a staff card from hand, paying up to 3 krones less.

97.name: E. Gizia
97.body: Select an action space with at least one die and carry out that action as normal, without taking a die from the space. You cannot boost this action.
97.details: Staff cards that trigger on taking a specific die cannot be used with this effect, as you are not taking a die.

99.name: Cramersopholus
99.body: Draw 1 staff card. Additionally, advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track.

100.name: Farmer Franz
100.body: Advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track. Additionally, occupy one additional room (any color) by turning it to the occupied side.

101.name: Brother Uwe
101.body: Advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track. Additionally, take a guest from the queue at no cost.

102.name: Conductor
102.body: Advance 1 space on the Emperor track. Additionally, occupy one additional room (any color) by turning it to the occupied side.

104.name: MacLeod
104.body: Play a staff card from hand at no cost.
